Mods.Name: Auto Touch
Mods.Description:
Focus on the laned notes.
Touch notes and Slide bodies will be automatically completed.

Mods.Name: Accuracy Challenge
Mods.Description: Fail the play if your accuracy drops below a configured threshold.

Settings.Name: minimum_accuracy
Settings.Label: Minimum accuracy
Settings.Description: Trigger a failure if your accuracy goes below this value.

Settings.Name: accuracy_judge_mode
Settings.Label: Accuracy mode
Settings.Description: The mode of accuracy that will trigger failure.

Settings.Name: restart
Settings.Label: Restart on fail
Settings.Description: Automatically restarts when failed.

Mods.Name: Barrel Roll
Mods.Description: Rotate the entire playfield — notes move on a spinning wheel.

Settings.Name: spin_speed
Settings.Label: Roll speed
Settings.Description: Rotations per minute

Settings.Name: direction
Settings.Label: Direction
Settings.Description: The direction of rotation

Mods.Name: Challenge
Mods.Description: You only get a small margin for errors.

Settings.Name: live_setting
Settings.Label: Number of lives
Settings.Description: The number of lives the player starts with.

Mods.Name: Daycore
Mods.Description: Apply the 'daycore' audio effect (a subtle speed/pitch change) for a different feel.

Mods.Name: Difficulty Adjust
Mods.Description: Override beatmap difficulty options (e.g. No BREAK notes, No EX notes, or All EX notes).

Settings.Name: break_removal
Settings.Label: No BREAK notes
Settings.Description: No BREAK notes

Settings.Name: ex_removal
Settings.Label: No EX notes
Settings.Description: No EX notes

Settings.Name: all_ex
Settings.Label: All EX notes
Settings.Description: All EX notes

Mods.Name: Double Time
Mods.Description: Increase playback speed (song plays faster).

Settings.Name: speed_change
Settings.Label: Speed increase
Settings.Description: The actual increase to apply

Settings.Name: adjust_pitch
Settings.Label: Adjust pitch
Settings.Description: Should pitch be adjusted with speed

Mods.Name: Experimental
Mods.Description:
Some experimental features to be added to future sentakki builds. Autoplay/No-Fail recommended.
Replays unsupported.

Settings.Name: enable_slide_fans
Settings.Label: Fan slides
Settings.Description: Allow fan slides to occasionally appear (Requires multitouch)

Settings.Name: old_conversion
Settings.Label: Use old converter
Settings.Description: The old converter relied on RNG for just about everything. Included for comparison purposes.

Settings.Name: enable_twin_slides
Settings.Label: Twin slides
Settings.Description: Allow more than one Slide-body to share the same time and origin (Requires multitouch)

Settings.Name: enable_twin_notes
Settings.Label: Twin notes
Settings.Description: Allow more than one note to share the same times (Requires multitouch)

Mods.Name: Half Time
Mods.Description: Decrease playback speed (song plays slower).

Settings.Name: speed_change
Settings.Label: Speed increase
Settings.Description: The actual increase to apply

Settings.Name: adjust_pitch
Settings.Label: Adjust pitch
Settings.Description: Should pitch be adjusted with speed

Mods.Name: Hard Rock
Mods.Description: Judgement modes determine how strict the hit windows are during gameplay.

Settings.Name: judgement_mode
Settings.Label: Judgement mode
Settings.Description: Judgement modes determine how strict the hitwindows are during gameplay.

Settings.Name: minimum_valid_result
Settings.Label: Minimum result
Settings.Description: The minimum HitResult that is accepted during gameplay. Anything below will be considered a miss.

Settings.Name: strict_slider_tracking
Settings.Label: Strict slider tracking
Settings.Description: Whether strict tracking rules for slider-like objects are enabled.

Mods.Name: Hidden
Mods.Description: Notes fade out just before you hit them.

Settings.Name: visible_radius
Settings.Label: Visible radius
Settings.Description: The visible radius of laned notes.

Mods.Name: Mirror
Mods.Description: Flip the playfield horizontally, vertically, or both!

Settings.Name: vertical_mirrored
Settings.Label: ⇅ Mirror vertically
Settings.Description: Mirror entire playfield across the x-axis

Settings.Name: horizontal_mirrored
Settings.Label: ⇆ Mirror horizontally
Settings.Description: Mirror entire playfield across the y-axis

Mods.Name: Muted
Mods.Description: Can you still feel the rhythm without music?

Settings.Name: inverse_muting
Settings.Label: Start muted
Settings.Description: Increase volume as combo builds.

Settings.Name: enable_metronome
Settings.Label: Enable metronome
Settings.Description: Add a metronome beat to help you keep track of the rhythm.

Settings.Name: mute_combo_count
Settings.Label: Final volume at combo
Settings.Description: The combo count at which point the track reaches its final volume.

Settings.Name: affects_hit_sounds
Settings.Label: Mute hit sounds
Settings.Description: Hit sounds are also muted alongside the track.

Mods.Name: Nightcore
Mods.Description: Uguuuuuuuu...

Settings.Name: speed_change
Settings.Label: Speed increase
Settings.Description: The actual increase to apply

Mods.Name: Perfect
Mods.Description: SS or quit.

Settings.Name: restart
Settings.Label: Restart on fail
Settings.Description: Automatically restarts when failed.

Mods.Name: Sudden Death
Mods.Description: Miss and fail.

Settings.Name: restart
Settings.Label: Restart on fail
Settings.Description: Automatically restarts when failed.

Mods.Name: Synesthesia
Mods.Description: Colour hitobjects based on distance to previous/next hitobject.

Settings.Name: interval_colouring
Settings.Label: Interval colouring
Settings.Description: Colour hitobjects based on distance to previous/next hitobject.

Mods.Name: Touch Device
Mods.Description: Automatically applied to plays on devices with a touchscreen.

Mods.Name: Wind Up
Mods.Description: Can you keep up?

Settings.Name: initial_rate
Settings.Label: Initial rate
Settings.Description: The starting speed of the track

Settings.Name: final_rate
Settings.Label: Final rate
Settings.Description: The final speed to ramp to

Settings.Name: adjust_pitch
Settings.Label: Adjust pitch
Settings.Description: Should pitch be adjusted with speed

Mods.Name: Wind Down
Mods.Description: Sloooow doooown...

Settings.Name: initial_rate
Settings.Label: Initial rate
Settings.Description: The starting speed of the track

Settings.Name: final_rate
Settings.Label: Final rate
Settings.Description: The final speed to ramp to

Settings.Name: adjust_pitch
Settings.Label: Adjust pitch
Settings.Description: Should pitch be adjusted with speed
